attributes.action: Demolish the plan and say NO to a Casino in Middlesbrough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Middlesbrough "New Visions" are not supported by the people, demolition of sound and solid housing is not the way forward and the owners of Casinos are not philanthropists and the intentions of Casino owners is not to put money into the local economy but to take it out. The building of a Casino will not bring money into the town.
